renewed-contributions.title: The Science of Life
renewed-contributions.note: Exact issues not specified in CCE renewal record, though it says 'except Sundays'.   Some 1929 copyright dates with AI- registration numbers are given in this record, implying that installments may have been published abroad before they appeared in the New York American.

renewed-contributions.title: The Little King
renewed-contributions.note: This was the first 'Little King' comic to be syndicated by King Features.  Previous comics under this title, created by Otto Soglow, appeared in the New Yorker.  King Features is the only author mentioned in the CCE renewal record.
